price: 26. Jam priklauso viskas, kas yra danguose ir žemėje. Viskas paklūsta Jam.
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
